channel.title: Newbie to Ninja - OpenTelemetry Collector on Splunk Observability Cloud Workshops
channel.description: Recent content in Newbie to Ninja - OpenTelemetry Collector on Splunk Observability Cloud Workshops

item.title: OpenTelemetry Collector Extensions
item.description: Extensions are available primarily for tasks that do not involve processing telemetry data. Examples of extensions include health monitoring, service discovery, and data forwarding. Extensions are optional. extensions: health_check: pprof: endpoint: 0.0.0.0:1777 zpages: endpoint: 0.0.0.0:55679 Health Check Performance Profiler zPages

item.title: OpenTelemetry Collector Receivers
item.description: A receiver, which can be push or pull based, is how data gets into the Collector. Receivers may support one or more data sources.

item.title: OpenTelemetry Collector Processors
item.description: Processors are run on data between being received and being exported. Processors are optional though some are recommended.

item.title: OpenTelemetry Collector Exporters
item.description: An exporter, which can be push or pull based, is how you send data to one or more backends/destinations. Exporters may support one or more data sources.
